timeline.message:
fix moar flaky StorageTest.testNotificationStorage() [FINERACT-828]

similar fix to earlier Pull Request for the same

also added some more toString()

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, I'm not seeing this method being used anywhere, I wish to know why you wrote it
timeline.author: xurror

replies.bodyText:
Hello @xurror, if I am not wrong, it is explicitly used for debugging(if the test fails).
Refer to this how it helped: #858  and https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FINERACT-828
replies.author: thesmallstar
